alert.note: Alert for Russell; Scott; Washington (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 3:41PM EDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Sullivan, southwestern Russell, eastern Scott and western Washington Counties and the City of Bristol through 430 PM EDT... At 341 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles southwest of Cleveland Va to 14 miles northwest of Bristol Va to Gate City. Movement was southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Kingsport, Bristol Tn, Bristol Va, Abingdon, Lebanon, Gate City, Weber City, Cleveland Va, Walnut Hill and Bluff City. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
